attributes.additional_details:
Reclassification of semi auto centerfire weapons to section1 on these conditions:
Applicant has held a section 1 firearms licence for over 10 years.
Weapon to be used only for Deer stalking and the destuction of foxes with a magazine restricted to 3 rounds.
Weapon to be used on Home Office approved firing ranges by persons who have been members for more than 8 years.Magazines used for target are unrestricted.
